articles.author: Joshua Rivera
articles.title: Watch Ant-Man try to explain why he couldn’t go up Thanos’ Thanus
articles.description: A new short film on Disney’s latest cruise ship wants you to know Ant-Man has reasons for refusing to anally excavate the Mad Titan in the Infinity War and Endgame.
articles.content: Sup, geeks and gamers. Are you one of the countless fans who have been demanding that Scott Lang, the Ant-Man, finally explain himself for his refusal to kill Thanos via the worlds smallest dropkick,… [+1544 chars]

articles.author: Nicole Carpenter
articles.title: Halo Infinite’s campaign co-op beta begins July 11, with mission replay
articles.description: 343 Industries announced Thursday that the Halo Infinite campaign co-op beta period begins July 11 and runs until July 22. During that time, players will be able to test out the mission replay feature, too.
articles.content: Halo Infinite players will finally be able to try out campaign co-op when 343 Industries test period begins July 11. The 10-day event running from July 11 to July 22 is open to anyone that owns the H… [+3613 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Skate insider program to offer early access to playtests of Skate 4
articles.description: EA says the new Skate is still “very early” in development and a new gameplay video shows off how it’s coming along. Skate 4 fans can also sign up for a skate insider program to playtest the game early.
articles.content: Skate still very early in development, developer says

articles.author: Nicole Clark
articles.title: The Sims 4 High School Years expansion pack is coming in July
articles.description: The Sims 4 High School Years expansion pack will be released on July 28. Sims go to Copperdale High, where they attend classes and extracurriculars, hang out at new date spots, and attend prom.
articles.content: The pack is coming in July, but the high school memories last forever

articles.author: Ryan Gilliam
articles.title: Magic: The Gathering’s first Warhammer 40,000 set is delayed
articles.description: Due to supply chain issues, the new Commander decks will not be available in August
articles.content: After revealing the new Universe Beyond product line in February of last year, Wizards of the Coast was set to release its first Warhammer 40,000Magic: The Gathering Set on Aug. 12. However, the deve… [+1029 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Gilliam
articles.title: Return to Monkey Island going quiet after fan abuse over art style
articles.description: After fans send abuse over the new art style for Return to Monkey Island, creator Ron Gilbert revealed that he’ll no longer be sharing about the game prior to release.
articles.content:
Ron Gilbert, creator of the point-and-click Monkey Island series, will no longer be talking about or showing his upcoming game: Return to Monkey Island. 
Since showing off the game via a trailer in … [+2314 chars]

articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.title: Monster High’s live-action movie is a freaky, fang-tastic musical
articles.description: The popular Mattel doll line gets a live action movie musical, bringing back Frankie Stein, Clawdeen, and Draculaura and other favorite characters. Monster High: The Movie hits Nickelodeon and Paramount Plus on Oct. 6.
articles.content: Time to watch the OG web series

articles.author: Charlie Hall
articles.title: Kickstarter’s Zine Quest is moving back to February in 2023 and beyond
articles.description: Kickstarter’s popular Zine Quest is moving back to February in 2023. The change to August angered many small tabletop RPG developers and gave rise to the alternative event called Zine Month.
articles.content: In January 2022, Kickstarter chose to move its popular Zine Quest event from February to August. The move sparked outrage among its tightknit community of independent role-playing game developers, wh… [+1428 chars]

articles.author: Oli Welsh
articles.title: God of War Ragnarok director insists game is not delayed
articles.description: Cory Barlog, director of the 2018 God of War and its sequel Ragnarok for PS4 and PS5, says the game has not been delayed past 2022 but the release date announcement is not coming as soon as expected
articles.content: God of War director Cory Barlog has denied that a release date announcement for the games sequel, God of War Ragnarok, is imminent, and has asked fans for patience. But he also insists the game has n… [+2365 chars]

articles.author: Charlie Hall
articles.title: KeyForge, the procedurally generated CCG, has a new publisher
articles.description: KeyForge, the procedurally generated collectible card game, is getting fixed. A new company called Ghost Galaxy is committed to rebuilding the broken algorithm that put it into hiatus in September.
articles.content: Keyforge, the collectible card game designed by Magic: The Gathering creator Richard Garfield, is changing hands. Fantasy Flight Games has sold the property to Ghost Galaxy, a new company created by … [+1999 chars]
